Package com.clorabase.clorastore

package com.clorabase.clorastore
  • Class
    Description
    Clorastore
    This is the top-level class of the whole database.
    ClorastoreException
    An exception which is thrown when any database operation get failed.
    Collection
    This class represent a collection in the database.
    Document
    This class represent document in the database.
    Query
    A class to perform query and sort data on the basis of some condition.
    Reasons
    This enum includes the reason for which ClorastoreException is thrown.
